system.description: The Ork channels the collective psychic energy of the Waaagh!, allowing them to unleash brutal follow-up attacks when they charge.
system.benefit: If Ork successfully hits their Target with a Charge Action, they can spend their reaction to make an additional attack using the same Bonuses or Penalties as the original attack.

prerequisites.text: Ork, Berserk Charge, Furious Assault, Weapon Skill 40

specialAbilities.name: Waaagh! Energy
specialAbilities.description: When you hit with a Charge Action, spend your Reaction to make an additional attack with the same bonuses/penalties.
